summary: Tested Admin Tools feature: phone reset, pre-import check, and duplicate email detection. All backend endpoints and frontend UI components working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/contacts/admin/pre-import-check returns 200 with stats and warnings
Backend: GET /api/contacts/admin/duplicate-email-check returns 200 with duplicate groups
Backend: POST /api/contacts/admin/reset-phones rejects wrong confirmation text (400)
Backend: POST /api/contacts/admin/reset-phones rejects empty confirmation (400)
Backend: POST /api/contacts/admin/reset-phones rejects case mismatch (400)
Backend: POST /api/contacts/admin/reset-phones rejects partial match (400)
Backend: POST /api/contacts/admin/reset-phones requires request body (422)
Backend: GET /api/contacts/admin/operations returns 200 with audit trail
Backend: All admin endpoints require authentication (401/403 without token)
Frontend: Settings page loads with Admin Tools section visible
Frontend: Run Check button loads pre-import stats (9954 contacts, 3195 with phones, 0 duplicates)
Frontend: Ready for Import badge displayed correctly
Frontend: Warnings section shows phone data warning
Frontend: Check Duplicates button opens dialog with results
Frontend: Duplicate Email Report shows 0 groups, 0 affected contacts
Frontend: Reset Phones button opens confirmation dialog
Frontend: Confirmation dialog shows warning about destructive operation
Frontend: Confirmation input requires typing 'RESET PHONES' exactly
Frontend: Reset All Phones button is disabled until correct text entered
Frontend: Reset All Phones button becomes enabled with correct confirmation text
seed_data_creation: None - used existing data (9954 contacts, 3195 with phones)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin Tools feature fully tested. Pre-import check shows system ready for import with 0 duplicate email groups. 3195 contacts have phone data. Phone reset is a destructive operation requiring 'RESET PHONES' confirmation text - DO NOT execute unless specifically testing that flow. All endpoints require authentication.

returns.recommendation: No duplicate emails found. Safe to proceed with import.
